name: Tito Vampir
description:
You and your friend Vinko Tetković want to se if the legend about Tito vampir is true.
So you try to do the ritual, the ritual was a succses but Tito is mad and thirsty for blood. 

Can you escape Tito in this 1970s styled game, or will you be draind from your blood?

-I plane on updating the game and mabye ade more endings.
-This project took 15 hours to make
-And i will make more of these type of games.
-Controls are shown in-game

Thanks for playing.
